string-array.name: workout_instructions
string-array.item: This is how to do an ab workout
This is how to do a bicep (arm) workout
This is how to do a calf (leg) workout

What you'll need: A bench and a barbell (or dumbbells).

What to do: Lay on your back on the bench, with your arms slightly more than shoulder width apart and the barbell above your chest. Lift, extending your arms all the way (CAREFUL not to lock your elbows!). Lower the weight to chest level and repeat.

How you can switch it up: Use an incline or decline bench. This will emphasise the upper and lower pectoral (chest) respectively. Use a narrower grip to more emphasise the triceps (back of the arm)
